blocks.name: diff.ccm2.s
diff.ccm2.c
diff.ccm2.w
df-com2
blocks.content: A device to add commutativity to various sorts of rings. I use ` ran g ` because I suppose ` g ` has a neutral element and therefore is onto. (Contributed by FL, 6-Sep-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-com2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccm2, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

thm iscom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), ccm2), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), ccm2), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2d(cop(c0, c2), ccm2, copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(ccm2, copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))))
  df-com2(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  opelopabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  raleqdv(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  rneq(cv(hs1), c0)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, crn(c0), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm iscom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(< c0, c2 > ‚àà Com2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), < c0, c2 > ‚àà Com2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < hs1, hs0 > | ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(hs1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))})
  eleq2d(< c0, c2 >, ccm2, { < hs1, hs0 > | ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(hs1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), Com2 = { < hs1, hs0 > | ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(hs1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))})
  df-com2(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  opelopabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(hs1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))))
  raleqbidv(s0, ran(hs1), ran(c0), hs1 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))
  raleqdv(s1, ran(hs1), ran(c0), hs1 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))
  rneq(hs1, c0)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, ran(c0), ran(c0), hs0 = c2, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))
  eqeq12d((s0[hs0]s1), (s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c2]s1), (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s0, s1)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s1, s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2)))
  iscrngo(c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wcel(c0, ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(crngo))

  eleq1(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2)
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqi(s0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))))
  raleqbii(s1, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))
  eqtri(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c3))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CRingOps ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(2nd ` c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà CRingOps ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))), d(s1, c1))

  iscrngo(c0)

  syl(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c0 ‚àà Com2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))), c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, Rel(RingOps))
  relrngo()

  syl6bb(c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, c0 ‚àà Com2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ‚àà Com2)
  eleq1(c0, <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, ccm2)
  3bitr4ri(<(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ‚àà Com2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran((1st ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))))
  raleqi(s0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0)))
  ralbii(s0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0)))
  raleqbii(s1, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0), (s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))
  eqtri(c1, ran((1st ` c0)), ran(c3))
  rneqi(c3, (1st ` c0))
  eqeq12i((s0[c2]s1), (s1[c2]s0), (s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1), (s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))

thm iscringd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccring))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cablo))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crn(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))

thm crngm4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c7))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5))))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, c4), c6, c5), co(co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, c3), c6, c5), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))))
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, c4), c6, c5, co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, c3), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))))
  adantrrr(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, c3)))

  df-3an(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))

  sylan(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, c4), c6, c5), co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5))), wcel(c0, crngo))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, c4), c6, c5), co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5))), w3a(wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2))
  3expb(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2))
  rngocl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c7)
  simprrl(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  rngoass(c0, co(c1, c6, c3), c2, c4, c5, c6, c7)

  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantrrr(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2))
  adantrlr(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2))
  3expb(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2))

  simprrr(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  rngoass(c0, co(c1, c6, c4), c2, c3, c5, c6, c7)

blocks.name: fldcrng
blocks.content: A field is a commutative ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)

thm fldcrng(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfld), wcel(c0, ccring))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, cfld), wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, ccm2)), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2)))
  anim1i(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, ccm2), wcel(c0, crngo))
  simpld(wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(cres(cfv(c2nd, c0), cxp(cdif(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))), cdif(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))))), cgr))
  drngoi(c0, cfv(c2nd, c0), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)))
  elin2(c0, cfld, cdrng, ccm2)
  df-fld()
  iscrngo(c0)
}

thm crngohomfo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, crngo)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c0, crnghom, c1)), wfo(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c1, ccring))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c1st, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, crn(c6))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, crngo)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c0, crnghom, c1)), wfo(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c1, ccring), wcel(c1, crngo), wral(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, c1), cv(hs0))))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, crngo), wa(wcel(c2, co(c0, crnghom, c1)), wfo(c2, c3, c4)))
  ralrimivv(hs0, hs1, c4, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, crngo)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c0, crnghom, c1)), wfo(c2, c3, c4))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, c1), cv(hs0))))
